features: One4Life accessory: Compatible with Britax One4Life car seat for rear-facing use only (car seat sold separately)
Added safety: Helps reduce movement in the event of a crash
Comfortable ride: Provides extra legroom, keeping your child comfortable
Easy clean: Soft mesh fabric cover on the bar is removable for cleaning and easily attaches with color coded buttons
body.description: Easily attach the anti-rebound bar to your Britax USA One4Life car seat for added safety and comfort. Used only in rear-facing mode, The anti-rebound bar helps reduce movement in the event of a crash. This accessory also gives your child extra legroom, keeping them comfortable for the ride. The mesh cover is removable for easy cleaning and the color-coded buttons make attaching and removing the anti-rebound bar a breeze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All-In-One Car Seat One4Life ClickTight Grows with your child for ten years, surrounding them with trusted Britax safety. The only 10-year car seat with ClickTight, so it's easy to install in three simple steps.

Previous page Install with Confidence in three simple steps Pinch and lift to open seat to gain easy access to vehicle seat belt path. No stressing or struggling Buckle seat belt Easily thread vehicle seat belt through the open belt path Click it Closed! The steel tensioner automatically tightens the seat into your vehicle, taking care of the hard work Next page 1 Easy Install 2 Open 3 Buckle 4 Close

Dishwasher-Safe Cup Holders easily twist out for cleaning between rides. Exclusive! V-Shaped Tether with staged-release stitches helps slow and reduce forward movement during a crash High-Strength Steel Frame reinforces the seat structure to help keep it sturdy and stabilized. Built-In Cooling Channels & Ventilated Mesh improve air flow to keep your child comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Rebound Bar
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this rebound bar because all my research pointed to the enhanced safety features with this installed. Thankfully I haven't needed to test it yet, but I'm glad it's in place. The bar was very easy to install. The one downside is that it takes up considerably more space in the car and there's not much space to work with on the passenger seat now (this is for a honda civic).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful addition for a safe ride
reviews.reviewText: After tons of research, I knew I wanted an antirebound bar for our child's Britax carseat. It was easy to install and is good quality. The only annoyance is the cover often gets pushed off a little by their kicking feet, but the additional safety is worth the constant adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For One4Life car seat. Easy to install.
reviews.reviewText: We bought two, one for each vehicle. Super easy to install! Just follow the directions. Our little one even has a little more leg room too! The seat is easy to use, stylish, comfortable and my LO a actually likes his car seat! To those that said it’s not comfortable and it’s a hard seat, not the case at all. Respectfully , those individuals missed a step. Once you remove the infant insert, you will need to fold down the rest of the seat that’s tucked under the back area (area where your child’s back meets the seat). We also love that our LO stays rear facing for longer with this seat. Which is key for his safety. He’s three now and still rear facing and not close to either limit for seated height or weight rear facing limits. We love the Britax brand and love how they EXCEED US and EU car seat standards!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Aumenta la seguridad de tu silla al evitar el rebote. Facil de instalar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is a high quality easy install car seat with extended rear facing options! The added anti rebound bar is a wonderful easy/quick install option for added safety!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An extra thats worth buying.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as an add on to keep our grandaughter safe. She loves the soft webbing to push her feet into. Keeps the main seat clean too as an added bonus to the car seat safety.
